discoverItems.name: Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park
discoverItems.description: A memorial park dedicated to Ghana's first president, featuring his mausoleum, museum, and beautiful gardens.

discoverItems.name: Labadi Beach
discoverItems.description: One of Accra's most popular beaches, known for its vibrant atmosphere, music, and local food vendors.

discoverItems.name: Makola Market
discoverItems.description: A bustling traditional market offering everything from fresh produce to textiles and household goods.

discoverItems.name: National Museum of Ghana
discoverItems.description: The largest and oldest museum in Ghana, showcasing the country's history from prehistoric times to present.

discoverItems.name: Independence Square
discoverItems.description: A monumental square built to commemorate Ghana's independence, featuring the Independence Arch and Black Star Gate.

discoverItems.name: Jamestown Lighthouse
discoverItems.description: Historic lighthouse offering panoramic views of the city and coastline from its observation deck.

discoverItems.name: Arts Centre
discoverItems.description: A vibrant marketplace for traditional Ghanaian arts, crafts, textiles, and souvenirs.

discoverItems.name: Aburi Botanical Gardens
discoverItems.description: Beautiful botanical garden established in 1890, featuring exotic plants, trees, and peaceful walking paths.
